How to install TEASER¶

Installation¶

The best option to install TEASER is to clone the repository by using:

git clone [SSH-Key/Https]

and then run:

pip install -e [Path/to/your/Teaser/Clone]

You need to have pip installed (see dependencies).

Deinstallation¶

The best option is not to uninstall TEASER at all:-). However, if you want to uninstall it, just use:

pip uninstall teaser

Dependencies¶

TEASER uses Python 2.7 <= v >=3.3. Further using a WinPython distribution is recommended (https://winpython.github.io/). WinPython comes along with a lot of Python packages (e.g. SciPy, NumPy, pip, PyQT, etc.) that are used in the TEASER code.

In addition, TEASER requires some specific Python packages:

  1. Mako: template Engine install on a python-enabled command line with pip install -U mako
  2. PyXB: XML binding Engine install on a python-enabled command line with pip install -U pyxb
  3. pytest: Unit Tests engine install on a python-enabled command line with pip install -U pytest
